page.title: 12 Local government in Keith
page.content: The town of Keith is situated in the Moray District of the Grampian Region. The District Council offices are located in Elgin and it is from here that local services are controlled.The offices of the Regional Council are in Aberdeen.The councillor elected to serve on the Regional Council is Mr.W. Kelty and on the District Council,Mr.L. Mann. Many of the Council services for the local area are based in Keith.The Roads Dept.depot is in Bridge Street from where snowploughs and gritters operate in winter to keep the roads free from snow and ice.The refuse collection lorries are garaged in Balloch Road.The Council offices in Keith are in the Institute building in Mid Street.Rents for council houses may be paid here and enquiries about other council services such as planning can be made.
